issue.title: [CF 1234] Last Ability Used incorrect when RJW->BoK used
issue.body:
The player attribute: Last Ability Used mostly works okay, but if I cast rushing jade wind and then blackout kick it will at first correctly identify that BoK was the last skill used. But when the second tick of rushing jade wind pulses it no longer correctly identifies the BoK as the last spell used.

Thanks! Let me know if and how I can provide more info! Thanks for the great work!


> Posted by CurseForge user pouljin | Imported from CurseForge issue #1234 | Raw

comments.body:
Hello

I'd like to add that this happens even if you use the spell ids.

For example, if I use set the Last Ability Used to detect Spell ID:26573 (Consecrate), it also triggers if it detects Spell ID:81297 (The Consecrate damage ticks that affect mobs).


> Posted by CurseForge user HawkBat85

It was screwed up in more ways than one. Fixed in the latest alpha.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
